name: Wicked Mines
description:
This is played like classic Minesweeper, but with one key difference: Exactly ten squares are lying about the number of nearby mines are lies.

You can trust the counts which say there are 1 or 2 mines nearby. But anything that says 3 or higher is suspect - it may mean the number it says, or it may mean one fewer.

Controls:

  • Right click to mark an unopened square with a flag
  • Right click a square with a count to mark it as a lie

Thanks for playing.
